name: Sisyphus (Jelani Stowers)
description:
Press spacebar to push the boulder up the hill. Release to let go. Press it again to catch the boulder at the bottom.

Failure = Progress: Your goal is to get to the top of the hill. But enemies don't want that to happen, so smash them with your boulder! But how do you get to the top?

Music credit: Korrin the Human

Background art credit: Just Deku
